message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $6,000.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 represents the value I see in the product, I'm willing to come down to $10,000 for a quick sale.  This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  I could meet you halfway between our offers. Would $8,000 work for you?
